title: Leeds v Newcastle: Premier League – live
summary: Newcastle is seeking their first league victory of the season at Elland Road. Scott Murray provides live updates on the match. Fans can follow the action minute-by-minute.

title: England v Samoa: Women’s Rugby World Cup 2025 – live
summary: Daniel Gallan provides live updates on the match between the hosts and Samoa in their second Pool A fixture. Fans can follow the action minute-by-minute as the game unfolds. Stay tuned for key moments and developments throughout the match.

title: Manchester United v Burnley, Tottenham v Bournemouth: Premier League, EFL and more – live
summary: Emillia Hawkins is reporting on the latest developments from various football leagues, including the Premier League, EFL, and Bundesliga. Stay updated on key matches and news in the world of football. Tune in for real-time coverage and insights.

title: US Open tennis 2025: Gauff, Sinner and Osaka in action on day seven – live
summary: Katy Murrells is providing updates from the third round of the tournament at Flushing Meadows. Fans can follow her rolling report for the latest scores and highlights. Stay tuned for real-time insights and developments.

title: Late Fame review – Willem Dafoe is a natural poet in a slice-of-life New York fable
summary: A forgotten poetry collection by a postman has garnered renewed interest, captivating a new audience. The story highlights how past treasures can resonate and inspire in contemporary times. This rediscovery showcases the enduring power of literature across generations.
